timeline.message:
Update root readme

- Making it more accessible to people consuming this page on azure.github.io to avoid redirecting to github from docs
- Updating the description to point people to the most recent packages

timeline.bodyText:
Update the following text as well in Important section since the reference to January 2020 GA libraries is removed.
The Azure SDK team is pleased to make available the January 2020 client library General Availability (GA) release.
timeline.author: srnagar
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -22,27 +22,17 @@ Java 8 or later is required to use the January 2020 client libraries, otherwise
 
 Each service might have a number of libraries available from each of the following categories:
 
-- [Client: GA January 2020 Releases](#Client-GA-January-2020-Releases)
+- [Client: New Releases](#Client-New-Releases)

replies.bodyText: The anchor on line 68 will need to be fixed as well.  Please grep the file for "January" There's ~4 spots that will need to be fixed at the same time.
replies.author: joshfree
